creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
inscription: 求食無餘粒衣無ー絲　是吾衣食道獨楽誰期 (Seeking food without a grain too much / Wearing threadbare clothing / My manner of dress and eating / Who can have pleasure alone?) [Rhiannon Paget]
markings: poem UR red seal: 無邪 {muja}; poem LL red seals: 福田世耕 {Fukuda Seikō} [Fukuda Seikō #5], 静處 {seisho} [seisho #5]; LLC red seal: 拙居 {sekkyo}
medium: Hanging scroll, ink and color on paper
signed: 碧翁詩畫 {Hekiō shiga} (poem and painting by Hekiō)
title: Boating on a Pure Creek
